## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.clj`
  - `.cljs`
  - `.cljc`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                     | Description                   | Default value |
|------------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| CLOJURE_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| CLOJURE_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
